name: The Light Scale Fish
description:
This was a Solo game development project made by Adam Visser. Modeling, texturing, rigging, animating, cutscenes, blueprint coding, and more. The soundtrack is also an original track specifically made for the game by myself. 

The Light Scale Fish is a 3D Unreal Engine 5 experience. This is a third-person adventure game. Seek out the light-fish scales as a mysterious tiny mermaid-like being. Uncover the mysteries of the light-scale fish. This project started as a small concept for my daughter but evolved into a full game demo.

Link to my artstation: https://www.artstation.com/codeadvanced
